name: @mobilebiz/vonage-mcp-server
description: Vonage SMS and Voice MCP Server - Send SMS and make voice calls using Vonage API
long_description: This extension provides Model Context Protocol (MCP) server capabilities for Vonage, allowing AI assistants to send SMS messages and make voice calls through the Vonage API.

vonage_application_id.title: Vonage Application ID
vonage_application_id.description: Your Vonage Application ID from the Vonage Developer Portal

vonage_private_key_path.title: Private Key Path
vonage_private_key_path.description: Full path to your Vonage private key file (e.g., /Users/your-name/vonage/private.key)

vonage_voice_from.title: Voice Call From Number
vonage_voice_from.description: Phone number to use for voice calls in E.164 format (e.g., 81345438093)
